update club
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
la = #{la,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lo = #{lo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where club_Id = #{clubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update club set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, la = #{la,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lo = #{lo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, area = #{area,jdbcType=REAL}, open_time = #{openTime,jdbcType=TIME}, close_time = #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIME}, jcss = #{jcss,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where club_Id = #{clubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
